home.title: Step Into the 80s
home.description: Rediscover the magic of 80s pop culture. From neon lights to iconic fashion and unforgettable trends, dive into a vibrant era!

movies.title: 80s Cinema
movies.description: Relive the cinematic wonders of the 80s. From timeless blockbusters to cult classics, immerse yourself in a golden age of storytelling!

music.title: The Rhythm of the 80s
music.description: Rediscover the beats of the 80s. From synth-pop hits to rock anthems, let the sounds of this iconic decade take you back in time

series.title: 80s screens
series.description: Step into the world of 80s TV. From gripping dramas to laugh-out-loud sitcoms, revisit the shows that defined a generation!

games.title: A window to the gamer past
games.description: Experience the thrill of 80s gaming. From pixelated adventures to arcade legends, explore the games that started it all!
